items.title: Add calgary event (the one spread over a week)
Link to "Why Attend" in navigation bar
Add message to the organizers explaining why we have two dates this year
items.body:
As per [Trello Card](https://trello.com/c/O7aiGTQ0/54-explain-the-two-dates-asap), I added an explicit explanation right next to the date.

If this is alright for everyone, I'd merge it and also tweet a similar message so everyone knows what's going on

items.title: Add Event in London at Makers
Allow virtual events and list them under 'Find an event'
items.body:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/418117/47245216-b5c90380-d3f8-11e8-861f-6386785f4453.png)

Instead of providing the location details, just use `"location": "virtual"` like so:

```json
{
  "title": "GDCR18 on Twitch",
  "url": "https://www.twitch.tv/YaddaYadda",
  "moderators": [],
  "location": "virtual"
}
```

items.title: Move participants between rooms if they're too empty or too full
items.body:
Right now, I went with 8 people as the upper boundary. The tool will (by default) auto-move to another room after 1 second and display a warning. If you uncheck the "autoswitch" toggle, it will merely suggest you join another room.

It also will only start the video conference once the user presses "START".

items.title: Update hosting tools for #gdcr18
items.body:
- Change hashtag from #gdcr17 to #gdcr18
- Switch to meet.jit.si for video calls

meet.jit.si will potentially support up to 50 participants (neeeever tried that and I'm skeptical given that the WiFi at the events will be highly under load already), but I'm considering to lower the amount of rooms per timezone cluster too :thinking: but that's a detail we can see to.

Most importantly, this PR restores videocall functionality. :+1:

items.title: Issue 336 add sort of intro at homepage
items.body:
Superseeds/Closes #344 

See #344 and #336 for the context. We all can push to this branch :tada:
